definition: warm/lukewarm/temperature/to warm up/mild/soft/tender/to review (a lesson etc)/fever (TCM)/old variant of 瘟[wen1]
"water" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 85), occurring in 没, 法, 流 etc/see also 三點水|三点水[san1 dian3 shui3]
Wen Jiabao (1942-), Premier of PRC from 2003-2013
Wenzhou prefecture level city in Zhejiang
to become cooler/to lower the temperature/cooling/(of interest, activity etc) to decline
to become hot/temperature rise/(fig.) to intensify/to hot up/to escalate/to get a boost
Arishang Nahiyisi or Wenquan county in Börtala Mongol autonomous prefecture 博爾塔拉蒙古自治州|博尔塔拉蒙古自治州, Xinjiang
Arishang Nahiyisi or Wenquan county in Börtala Mongol autonomous prefecture 博爾塔拉蒙古自治州|博尔塔拉蒙古自治州, Xinjiang

sentences.english: We may take the form of a thermostatically controlled housing temperature.
sentences.chinese: 我们可以采取恒定控制罩温的形式。

sentences.english: I'm Edwin. I'll show you to your hotel.
sentences.chinese: 我是爱德温，我带你去旅馆。

sentences.english: Like Dong, Wintour thinks she is never wrong.
sentences.chinese: 与董明珠一样，温图尔认为自己从不出错。

sentences.english: They have more bottom end, a warmer, mellower mid and upper mid-range, and often more top octave.
sentences.chinese: 低端丰满，中频又温又纯，更经常在极高频段更出彩。

sentences.english: The broad seal was impressed with Winthrop's coat of arms.
sentences.chinese: 硕大的火漆封蜡上盖着温思罗普的纹章。

sentences.english: Choose the part classic documentation for this purpose , specially, the model carrying out temperature wine pot outward appearance analyses.
sentences.chinese: 为此，特选部分典型案例，进行温酒壶外观造型分析。

sentences.english: For different soil depths, the amplitude of temperature daily variation can be approximated as an exponential function of the depth.
sentences.chinese: 一日内地温变幅与深度关系可拟合成指数函数。

sentences.english: Abundant kidney-yang warms and promotes all the viscera and organs.
sentences.chinese: 肾阳足，肌体各脏腑组织器官得以温平和推动。

sentences.english: I"m Edwin, I"ll show you to your hotel.
sentences.chinese: 我是爱德温，来带你去旅馆。

sentences.english: Water is not cool, unexpectedly is warm, seemed slightly salty, very comfortable.
sentences.chinese: 水不凉，竟是温的，好像还微微有点咸，很舒适。

sentences.english: The technological specification of the pole by the high speed warm extrusion was worked out.
sentences.chinese: 拟制了磁极高速温挤压工艺规范。

sentences.english: LADY WINDERMERE. Why do you TALK so trivially about life, then?
sentences.chinese: 温夫人那你“讨论”人生为什么这么不正不经呢？

sentences.english: His calm manner slaked their enthusiasm.
sentences.chinese: 他的冷静态度使他们的狂热降了温。

sentences.english: Oprah's programme about literature, in which she reviews books.
sentences.chinese: 温弗里的文学节目是评论书籍的。

sentences.english: The utility model relates to an electrothermal wine warming kettle which belongs to the field of an individual and domestic article.
sentences.chinese: 本实用新型电热温酒壶属个人及家庭用品领域。

definition: the five Liang of the Sixteen Kingdoms, namely: Former Liang 前涼|前凉 (314-376), Later Liang 後涼|后凉 (386-403), Northern Liang 北涼|北凉 (398-439), Southern Liang 南涼|南凉 (397-414), Western Liang 西涼|西凉 (400-421)

(of taste) hot or pungent/hard/laborious/suffering/eighth in order/eighth of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/letter "H" or Roman "VIII" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/ancient Chinese compass point: 285°/octa
to warm up/to heat up/hot (of weather)/heat/fervent
Chinese mugwort or wormwood/moxa/to stop or cut short/phonetic "ai" or "i"/abbr. for 艾滋病[ai4 zi1 bing4], AIDS
to store/to stand/space between the door and the entrance screen
outstanding/particularly, especially/a fault/to express discontentment against
pool/pond/(of metals etc) luster/favor or beneficence/damp/moist
